segments.text: Good , morning ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . Could you tell me the times of trains to London , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . there are trains at 7:59 , 9:18 , 10:32 and 11:55
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the 7:59 get to London ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At 9:36 . And the 9:18 gets to London at 9:55 , the 10:32 at 11:09 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about coming back ? I'd like to come back about 7 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's one at 19:00 and the next is at 19:40 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you get on before 4 p . m . or after 6 p . m . there is saver return which is $ 9.45 , an ordinary return is $ 16.45 .
segments.speaker: S1
